channel.title: Rune-MTP 614 Development Team Needed
channel.description:
Hey guys I'm back into rsps and I currently want to make a 614. I'm using legacy 614 as base and Ive made alot of improvements to it. I still need alot of help because I'm not very experienced 500+. I also could use a lot of people who are looking to test out combat by playing so If you want to beta test please pm me or post here and I will pm you a client link.
So far I have: -Improved combat -added donator system -added teles -good system for getting items is ready, but atm I have most items spawnable and some donators only can wear.
What I want to do: -Improve combat even more (Basically one of the main problems is when you stand on someone while fighting.) -Make a multi pking spot -add npcs to fight (preferably corp and GWD) -have shops.
If you are looking to beta test or just have fun playing please post or pm and I will pm you the client link If you think you would be able to help out coding please post or pm me with what you are able to do.

Thanks. Starting on summoning and skilling today. Will post screenies in development section

item.title: Rune-MTP 614 Development Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:9, topic:386884”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=482654.msg3536172#msg3536172 date=1300575245]

I don’t want to join but.

The NPC VS NPC is easy, look at your player vs player combat methods, adapt them and create a somewhat easy config aka for a format; could be put into config.java like I did with drops but that can cause problems… So createa CFG file to load them

{1,1} is just an example of how you can do it, or you can tab it in a CFG file. What suits you.

I get what your saying but something is wrong with the whole server atm because I try to even move a current npc and it doesn’t move. There must be some kind of anti leech because I would just simply change an npc id to something else and it wouldn’t change.

Good luck Marc.

Thanks, Nice sig lol
[/quote]

Do you mean spawning npcs? I didn’t understand that fully. Maybe something wrong with your npc spawn. You got msn?[/quote]

I figured it out. I really do need a good coding 614 guy to help me tho

Read full topic
